Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces

Interface RequiredCI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComponentInterface
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CommunicationCI, ConnectorI, DataConnectorI, DataInboundPortI, DataOfferedCI.PushCI, DataOutboundPortI, DataRequiredCI, DataRequiredCI.PullCI, DataTwoWayCI, DataTwoWayConnectorI, DynamicComponentCreationCI, IntercessionCI, IntrospectionCI, Node_AccessPointCI, Node_RoutingCI, Node_TerminalCI, OutboundPortI, ReflectionCI, RoutingCI, TwoWayCI, TwoWayPortI<TWI>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConnector, AbstractDataConnector, AbstractDataInboundPort, AbstractDataOutboundPort, AbstractDataTwoWayConnector, AbstractDataTwoWayPort, AbstractOutboundPort, AbstractTwoWayConnector, AbstractTwoWayPort, ActiveDataConnector, CommunicationConnector, DataConnector, DataTwoWayConnector, DynamicComponentCreationConnector, DynamicComponentCreationInboundPort, DynamicComponentCreationOutboundPort, IntercessionConnector, IntercessionInboundPort, IntercessionOutboundPort, IntrospectionConnector, IntrospectionInboundPort, IntrospectionOutboundPort, Node_AccessPointCommInboundPort, Node_AccessPointCommInboundPort, Node_AccessPointCommOutboundPort, Node_AccessPointOutboundPort, Node_AccessPointRoutingInboundPort, Node_AccessPointRoutingInboundPort, Node_AccessPointRoutingOutboundPort, Node_RoutingCommInboundPort, Node_RoutingCommInboundPort, Node_RoutingCommOutboundPort, Node_RoutingOutBoundPort, Node_RoutingRoutingInboundPort, Node_RoutingRoutingInboundPort, Node_RoutingRoutingOutboundPort, Node_TerminalCommInboundPort, Node_TerminalCommInboundPort, Node_TerminalCommOutboundPort, Node_TerminalOutBoundPort, NodeConnector, ReflectionConnector, ReflectionInboundPort, ReflectionOutboundPort, RoutingConnector
    public interface RequiredCI
extends ComponentInterface
    The component interface RequiredCI represents the most general required interface for a component in this component model.

    Description

    Components have required and offered component interfaces. Required component interfaces are the ones through which the component calls its companion components to obtain services and data from them. Offered component interfaces are the ones through which a component is called to deliver services and data.

    Created on : 2011-10-31

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
